companiesData.companyTitle: Axis Bank (Payroll on Quess corp ltd.)
about: Provided excellent customer service in the car loan sector, collaborating with a team.
Assisted customers with loan inquiries and financial transactions.
Maintained accurate records and documentation for loan applications.
Resolved customer concerns and ensured their satisfaction.

projectsData.title: Todo-list
projectsData.description: Implemented essential features like adding, deleting, and monitoring tasks for an enhanced task management experience.

projectsData.title: IMDB-Clone
projectsData.description: Developed a movie information website and ensured seamless accessibility across various devices by applying responsive design principles.

projectsData.title: Weather Insight App
projectsData.description: Providing real-time updates on temperature, humidity, and wind speed. The intuitive and visually appealing interface ensures a seamless user experience for staying informed about weather conditions.

projectsData.title: React IPOD App
projectsData.description: The React iPod App is a nostalgic music player, recreating the classic iPod interface with a responsive touch interface, rotating click wheel, and customizable themes using React.

projectsData.title: BlackJack Game
projectsData.description: In this game, players aim to achieve a card sum close to 21 without exceeding it, with dynamic player statistics and restrictions on the maximum number of games allowed.

projectsData.title: Add-To-Cart Mobile App
projectsData.description: The Firebase Realtime Shopping List is a web app using Firebase Database for dynamic item addition and removal, providing real-time updates and collaborative management.

projectsData.title: Leads Tracker Chrome Extension
projectsData.description: This JavaScript code serves as a concise bookmark management extension, capturing and storing the current tab URL on button click. It displays clickable bookmarks and allows users to clear all with a double-click.

projectsData.title: Vault Vista Expense Tracker
projectsData.description: Empowering financial management with login, register, income, expense tracking, and transaction history features. Built with React, Firebase, Bootstrap, Styled-components, and Vite-React.
